name: Slider Demo
description:
This game is an endless running game, in which your goal is to collect crystals to keep on gaining time, this presents a slide with different obstacle which will keep you instable during you trip in the slide, you will have to avoid them while controlling a ball.

This is just a fun game which i have made few years ago, so hopefully you will like it, it’s still missing many things but i wanted to share it, as it may never see the light .
This game was Created by Skandar Ben Fradj as a solo project, if this game close to any current game it was just by luck so feel free to contact me  on my email [Skann@live.fr] for any Extra information.
This was made with love and unreal engine, 
Enjoy it :D .
